# Tender Announcement - Optical Character Recognition System

## Tender Information
* **Title (English)**: Optical Character Recognition - Request for Information
* **Title (French)**: Reconnaissance optique de caractères - Demande d'information
* **Reference Number**: WS4511819964-Doc4511825726
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: March 28, 2024
* **Closing Date**: April 26, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Expiration Date**: April 26, 2024

## Contract Overview
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites tenders for a project to modernize its radiation detection portals used to screen marine containers for radiation. The agency is proposing to install an Optical Character Recognition (OCR) system to capture container identification numbers written in accordance with the ISO 6364 standard.

## Equipment Details
The current equipment used is comprised of two towers, five meters tall and approximately five meters apart, which will be used to capture images of the marine containers as they pass at an average speed of 20 km/h. Each tower is equipped with two LED lights (totaling 4700 lumens) and one camera (Axis Q1614 Mk2).
